jobs.description: Accenture plc, is an Irish-domiciled multinational professional services company. A Fortune Global 500 company, it has been incorporated in Dublin. In 2019, the company reported revenues of $43.2 billion, with more than 492,000 employees serving clients in more than 120 countries.

Tata Consultancy Services Limited is a multinational IT company. Having offices across 46 countries.  TCS has 400k+ employees worldwide earning 20 billion $+ as annual revenue, here I work as a software engineer where I develop web applications for various clients.
Xaprika is an online food delivery startup based in Siliguri, India, I worked for them as a freelance web developer, I designed and developed their entire website and android app.
